channel.title: Scoble-proof on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Scoble-proof on Reflections

item.title: And another thing about Google Buzz
item.description: There are several issues that people have uncovered in the last 2 days that it has existed. For me, of all the features that Buzz lacks, one thing really stands out. There is no way to just see a list of the conversations (without the whole list of comments expanded by default). This is the main reason that I *had* to unfollow Scoble, Michael Arrington, Louis Gray and a bunch of others.
